thread.title: New north Lincoln senior living community offers views of Salt Creek Watershed
thread.title_full: New north Lincoln senior living community offers views of Salt Creek Watershed

author: @1011_news
title: New north Lincoln senior living community offers views of Salt Creek Watershed
text:
Located just south of Interstate 80’s 27th street exit, the Salt Creek Senior Living community includes 62 assisted living and 25 memory care units. By Matthew Mittlieder Published: Nov. 7, 2024 at 7:08 PM CST | Updated: 2 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
LINCOLN, Neb. (KOLN) - A new senior living center in north Lincoln has opened up, boasting a more than 93,000 square-foot community on the Salt Creek Watershed.
Located just south of Interstate 80’s 27th street exit, the Salt Creek Senior Living community owned by Dial Senior Living in Omaha includes 62 assisted living and 25 memory care units.
Officials said having a facility surrounded by the saline wetlands gives residents views of the landscape, all of which are protected by a conservation easement.
Joe Bohac, the Salt Creek Senior Living advisor, said that with the lack of senior centers in northern Lincoln, this community will serve a whole host of new people.
“Every day we’re getting older,” he said. “And we’re getting ready to hit the baby boomer generation that’s looking for senior living. So to have another option in the City of Lincoln, we felt there was a huge need for that.”
Other features of the facility include a dog park, theater, hair salon, wine bar and a fitness center.
The project has been in development since 2017 when planning first began, and opened in October.
